com.martinambrus.adminAnything

Class ClasspathHacker

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.martinambrus.adminAnything.ClasspathHacker

  • public final class ClasspathHacker
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for dynamically changing the classpath + adding classes during runtime.
    See Also:
    https://stackoverflow.com/a/2593771/467164

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ClasspathHacker() 

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void addFile(java.io.File f)
      Adds a file to the classpath ```java ClasspathHacker.addFile(new File("Plugins/MyAwesomePlugin.jar")); ```
      static void addFile(java.lang.String s)
      Adds a file to the classpath.
      static void addURL(java.net.URL u)
      Adds the content pointed by the URL to the classpath.

      • ClasspathHacker

    • Method Detail

      • addFile

        public static void addFile(java.lang.String s)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Adds a file to the classpath. ```java ClasspathHacker.addFile("Plugins/MySuperPlugin.jar"); ```
        Parameters:
        s - A String pointing to the JAR file to be added to the system class path.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - When the JAR file could not be found or read.

      • addFile

        public static void addFile(java.io.File f)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Adds a file to the classpath ```java ClasspathHacker.addFile(new File("Plugins/MyAwesomePlugin.jar")); ```
        Parameters:
        f - The File to be added to the system class path.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - When the JAR file could not be found or read.

      • addURL

        public static void addURL(java.net.URL u)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Adds the content pointed by the URL to the classpath. ```java ClasspathHacker.addURL(""); ```
        Parameters:
        u - The URL pointing to the content to be added to the system class path.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - When the JAR URL could not be read.
